function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of estimating disease prevalence based on wastewater testing","Impact":"Misleading or inaccurate disease prevalence estimates, leading to ineffective public health measures","Mitigation":"Combine wastewater testing with other epidemiological data for more accurate estimates, and validate results with clinical testing","Technologies":"Wastewater testing equipment, epidemiological data analysis tools","People":"Public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Reliance on wastewater testing to detect population-level prevalence of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Potential for overlooking localized outbreaks or clusters of cases","Mitigation":"Supplement wastewater testing with targeted clinical testing in high-risk areas, use wastewater data as one component of surveillance","Technologies":"Clinical testing equipment, geographic mapping tools","People":"Public health authorities, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"}]}
